name: Friendly Punch - Man's Fight
description:
What is it?

A top-down rogue-like fighting game where you play as man who fights against man (why? Because its fun!)

No goal, no storyline, just relax and have fun by fighting!

This is the early access beta and has not many content (like more maps and characters) and some functions which I am also planning to add.

Controls W,A,S,D = movement Mouse = rotate Shift = run LMB = attack Developer

Created by Daniel Oschepkov (contact me justdanieloschepkov@gmail.com)

Used the character's models by ROCKETARTS (Epic Games Marketplace)

Used Mixamo animations
